scriptedEmail.name: Calendar Registration Pending Notifications
scriptedEmail.description: Raises notification to user whose event registration is pending.
scriptedEmail.languageResources: <language key="en-us"> <resource name="Body_ConfirmationRequired">This event requires registration confirmation. This notice does not guarantee that you will be able to attend this event. You will receive a future notice confirming or cancelling this reservation.</resource> <resource name="Body_Introduction">Your request to attend {event_title_link} has been received.</resource> <resource name="Footer">You were sent this email because you opted to receive calendar notifications.
